subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sorana Cirstea and Victor Hanescu beat Australia’s Samantha Stosur and Lleyton Hewitt in mixed doubles to give Romania a 2-1 victory in the opener of the Hopman Cup.
snippet: Sorana Cirstea and Victor Hanescu beat Australia’s Samantha Stosur and Lleyton Hewitt in mixed doubles to give Romania a 2-1 victory in the opener of the Hopman Cup.
